about_the_game:
In a world of magic and malice, two souls find solace in a forbidden romance. The kingdom of Aradon has long suffered beneath the shadow of dark sorcery. Salvation requires an alliance, sealed by Princess Aurora’s marriage to a cruel prince. Yet Aurora’s heart belongs to another — a once-proud knight named Adrian, now cursed into a monstrous form. Beneath his terrifying appearance lies a heart of gold. Can Aurora break free from the chains of duty? Can Adrian lift the curse and reclaim his true self? And will their love be strong enough to defeat the vengeful witch Selena, whose thirst for revenge threatens to destroy them all?

This Collector's Edition includes:

💘 Embark on a magical adventure!

Guide Princess Aurora, torn between love and duty, and Adrian, a once-proud knight cursed into a monstrous form, as they navigate the perils of dark magic, treachery, and forbidden romance!

💘 Solve challenging puzzles!

Test your skills with a variety of hidden object games and puzzles, intricate mini-games, and brain-teasing challenges that are woven into the story. Every puzzle you solve brings Aurora and Adrian one step closer to breaking the curse and reclaiming their happiness!

💘 Shape your destiny!

Your decisions hold the power to change the course of the story. Choose carefully in key moments, as your choices will determine whether Aurora and Adrian can triumph over evil, or whether they will be separated forever by fate!

💘 Explore the enchanted kingdom!

Venture across the richly detailed kingdom of Aradon, from haunted forests to majestic castles, uncovering hidden objects and secrets. Unlock achievements that reward your exploration and showcase your mastery over the challenges that lie in wait!
